title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Existing Arrangements", May 15, 1935
medium: Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: JOB No. 530/ 3/8"-1'0-/CENTAUR, Joe/ 5/15/35; inscribed in graphite above stamp: DIMENSIONS/L.O.A. - 130'-0"/L.WL. 127'-8 1/2"/BREADTH MLD 22'-0"/DRAFT EXT. 7'-3"/SCALE 3/8"=1'0"; inscribed in graphite at lower right: YACHT "CENTAUR"/-EXISTING ARRANGEMENT-; dimensions and instructions in graphite; inscribed in red color pencil on verso, lower left: YACHT
description: Plan of existing "Centaur" yacht showing bedrooms, bathrooms, furniture placement, etc.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Existing Arrangements", May 15, 1935.
May 15, 1935. Graphite, red color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-440.
